info.name: 6. R&A Data APIs
info.description:
# Oracle Hospitality Reporting and Analytics (R&A) Data APIs

## Overview

The Reporting and Analytics (R&A) Data APIs provide **customized and dynamic access to all data** in Oracle Hospitality Reporting and Analytics through a powerful **GraphQL interface**. This API enables you to retrieve precisely the data you need from the R&A system, optimized specifically for reporting purposes and organized into logical Subject Areas.

**Official Documentation:** [Oracle Hospitality Data APIs Documentation](https://docs.oracle.com/en/industries/hospitality/integration-platform/ohipu/c_oracle_hospitality_data_apis.htm)

## Why GraphQL?

This API leverages GraphQL to provide significant advantages over traditional REST APIs:

- **Flexibility** - Request exactly the fields you need, nothing more, nothing less
    
- **Efficiency** - Retrieve multiple related resources in a single request, reducing network overhead
    
- **Precise Data Retrieval** - Eliminate over-fetching and under-fetching of data
    
- **Self-Documenting** - GraphQL schemas provide built-in documentation and type safety
    
- **Evolving API** - Add new fields and types without impacting existing queries
    

## Data Organization

Data in the R&A system is **optimized for reporting** and structured into **Subject Areas** that align with different functional domains of hospitality operations. This collection mirrors that organization, with folders representing each major subject area:

### Subject Areas in This Collection

- **OAuth Token** - Authentication endpoints for securing API access
    
- **Accounts Receivable** - AR Ledger, AR Aging Report, and receivables data
    
- **Administration** - Configuration, export mapping, property settings, event types, relationship types, and rate management (buckets, categories, classes, codes, deposit/cancellation rules, hurdles, rate seasons, restrictions, tiers, revenue groups, packages)
    
- **Bookings** - Reservation data, blocks, block production changes, and block status changes
    
- **Changes Log** - Audit trail and change tracking across the system
    
- **Financials** - Commissions, deposit ledger, guest ledger, transaction codes, transaction details, transaction summaries, efolios, fixed charges, and resort budget forecasts
    
- **Housekeeping** - Room management and task sheet data
    
- **Profiles** - Accounts, addresses, communications, contacts, individuals, loyalty, notes, relationships, and relationship types
    
- **Rooms** - Function space, room inventory, and room management
    
- **Sales and Event Management** - Activities, event forecasts, event postings, event resources, event status changes, and sales manager goals
    
- **Statistics** - Forecast summaries, history and forecast data, manager reports, reservation pace, reservations daily, reservations daily summary, and reservations summary
    
- **Simple Reports** - Pre-configured reports for activities, booking blocks, booking reservations, events, financial transactions, and profile individuals
    

## Authentication

All API requests require **OAuth 2.0 authentication**. Use the **Token** request in the **OAuth Token** folder to obtain an access token before making data queries. The token must be included in the Authorization header of subsequent requests.

Required credentials:

- `CLIENT_ID` - Your application's client identifier which can be obtained from the OHIP Developer Portal
    
- `CLIENT_SECRET` - Your application's client secret which can be obtained from the OHIP Developer Portal
    
- `scope` - This is always `urn:opc:hgbu:ws:__myscopes__`
    

## Getting Started

1. **Set Up Environment Variables** - Configure the required variables in the active environment:
    
    - `HostName` - Your Oracle Hospitality API endpoint
        
    - `CLIENT_ID` - Your OAuth client ID
        
    - `CLIENT_SECRET` - Your OAuth client secret
        
    - `HotelId` - The property/hotel identifier for your queries
        
    - Additional variables as needed for your specific use case
        
2. **Obtain an Access Token** - Execute the **Token** request in the **OAuth Token** folder to authenticate and receive an access token. The token will be automatically stored in the `Token` environment variable.
    
3. **Explore Subject Areas** - Browse the folders to find the subject area that contains the data you need. Each folder contains GraphQL queries tailored to specific reporting needs.
    
4. **Customize Your Queries** - Modify the GraphQL queries to request only the fields you need. Use GraphQL's introspection capabilities to discover available fields and types.
    
5. **Execute and Analyze** - Run your queries and use the returned data for reporting, analytics, integrations, or custom applications.
    

## Best Practices

- **Request Only What You Need** - Take advantage of GraphQL's flexibility to minimize payload size and improve performance
    
- **Use Variables** - Leverage Postman environment and collection variables for dynamic query parameters
    
- **Handle Pagination** - For large datasets, implement proper pagination in your queries
    
- **Monitor Rate Limits** - Be aware of API rate limits and implement appropriate throttling
    
- **Secure Your Credentials** - Never hardcode credentials; always use environment variables
    
- **Review Documentation** - Consult the official documentation for detailed schema information and query examples
    

## Support and Resources

For detailed information about available fields, query syntax, and advanced features, refer to the [official Oracle Hospitality Data APIs documentation](https://docs.oracle.com/en/industries/hospitality/integration-platform/ohipu/c_oracle_hospitality_data_apis.htm).

item.description:
The sample APIs for Accounts Receivable, AR Aging Report, AR ledger. | API | Description | Inputs Required | | --- | --- | --- | | Accounts Receivable | Detailed Accounts Receivable data, including Adjustments, Payments, Invoices and Posting for AR Accounts, with linked reservation data. | accountDetailsResort | | AR Aging Report | Detailed information on accounts receivable transactions including aging bucket of invoices, open transaction amounts, folio information and the account details. | aragingreportDetailsResort
aragingreportDetailsTrxDate | | AR ledger | Ledger details showing activity in accounts receivables including reservation and transaction details. | arledgerDetailsResort
arledgerDetailsTrxDate |

item.description:
The Administration has the API for for the Configurations and the system setups.

| API | **Description** | **Inputs Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Configuration | The Configuration Subject Area contains configuration/setting attributes from components such as Enterprise Administration, Financial Administration, Booking Administration and Client Relations Administration in OPERA. | resortDetailsResort |
| Export Mapping | Provides detailed information of all configured external codes/values (i.e. general ledger codes) mapped to codes used in OPERA (i.e transaction codes, market codes). It contains a comprehensive set of data including, but not limited to, Mapping Type Code/Descriptions, Mapped To Code/Descriptions with other Mapping details such as Export Values by Property / Chain. | expmappingDetailsResort |
| Property | Property definition with marketing, financial, and housekeeping details. | resortDetailsResort |
| Catering-Event Types | Event type definitions | eventtypeDetailsChainCode |
| Profile-Relationship Types | Relationship type definition. | relationshipDetailsChainCode |
| Rates-Buckets | Rate bucket definition. | ratebucketDetailsResort |
| Rates-Categories | Rate category definition including begin and end date and rate class association | ratecategoriesDetailsResort |
| Rates-Classes | Rate class definition with begin and end date. | rateclassesDetailsResort |
| Rates- Code Details | Rate Header information including room types, package elements, market and source code and associated flags. | ratecodedetailsDetailsResort |
| Rates-Codes | Rate detail information including all rate header details, room type, rate tiers and rate amounts per occupant. | ratecodeDetailsResort |
| Rates- Deposit and Cancellation Rules | Deposit and cancellation rules schedules and details by date, rate code and days prior to arrival or after booking. | ratedepositcanDetailsResort |
| Rates-Hurdles | Rate yielding and hurdle information including date, amount , length of stay and room type. | ratehurdlesDetailsResort |
| Rates-Rates Seasons | Rate season code definition. | rateseasonDetailsResort |
| Rates-Restrictions | Rate restriction definition including restriction type, date applied, room and rate code with day of the week and length of the stay details. | raterestrictionsDetailsProperty |
| Rates-Tiers | Rate tier definition by length of stays. | ratetierDetailsResort |
| Revenue-Groups and Types | Revenue group and type details. | revenuegrptypesDetailsResort |
| Revenue Packages | Package header details including package group setup and associated flags for selling and consumption options. | revenuepackagesDetailsResort |

item.name: Bookings

exec: // Initialize an empty object to combine the JSON parts
// Iterate over the parts and process each JSON part
// Remove unnecessary line breaks and spaces
// Check if the part contains JSON
// If needed, you can merge incremental items into the combinedJson or handle as required
// For example, if you want to add incremental items to the `data` object:
// Set the combined JSON as a new environment variable for further use
// Log the combined JSON to the console
// For testing purposes, you can also use
<button class="copyButton" type="button" data-clipboard-action="copy" data-clipboard-target="#copyText" style="background:green;color:white;">Copy to Clipboard</button>

graphql.query:
query BookingsBlock($input: BookingsBlockQueryArgumentsType!) {
  bookingsBlock(input: $input) {
                        blockDetails {
                            uDFC01
                            uDFC02
                            uDFC03
                            uDFC04
                            uDFC05
                            actualRoomNightsSold
                            actualRoomRevenue
                            actualFBRevenue
                            actualOtherRevenue
                            roomNightsSold
                            roomRevenue
                            fBRevenue
                            otherRevenue
                            cateringOnlyYN
                            functionType
                            guaranteedYN
                            reserveInventoryYN
                            rateCode
                            rateTier
                            meetingRevenue
                            meetingBudget
                            marketCode
                            sourceCode
                            leadSource
                            originCode
                            competition
                            startDate
                            endDate
                            shoulderStart
                            shoulderEnd
                            dateOpenedForPickup
                            inactiveDate
                            roomsCancellationDate
                            roomsDecisionDate
                            cateringDecisionDate
                            reservationMethod
                            cancellationNumber
                            reservationType
                            roomsCancellationReason
                            blockID
                            blockCode
                            blockAlias
                            bookingType
                            bookingTypeDescription
                            blockStatus
                            cateringStatus
                            blockPackage
                            eventAttendees
                            allotmentOrigin
                            cateringCancellationDate
                            status
                            description
                            property
                        }
                        blockDetailDetails {
                            roomType
                            rateAmountFor1PAX
                            rateAmountFor3PAX
                            prospectiveRevenue
                            pickupRevenue
                            contractRevenue
                            blockedRooms
                            released
                            available
                            prospectiveOccupancyBy1PAX
                            prospectiveOccupancyBy2PAX
                            prospectiveOccupancyBy3PAX
                            pickupOccupancyBy1PAX
                            pickupOccupancyBy2PAX
                            pickupOccupancyBy3PAX
                            pickupOccupancyBy4PAX
                            contractOccupancyBy1PAX
                            contractOccupancyBy2PAX
                            contractOccupancy3
                            contractOccupancyBy4PAX
                            stayDay
                            rate2
                            rate4
                            blockedOccupancy4
                        }
                        blockOwnerDetails {
                            roomsOwnerCode
                            fullName
                            property
                        }
                      }
                    }

request.description: Detailed information on the status changes throughout the production period of a block, including the new and old status codes, rooms and associated revenues, by property and Block Owner.

graphql.query:
query BookingsReservation($input: BookingsReservationQueryArgumentsType!){
  bookingsReservation(input: $input){
    reservationDetails {
      reservationNameID
        businessDateCreated
        confirmationNo
        reservationStatus
        reservationDate
        arrivalDate
        arrivalTime
        departureDate
        departureTime
        cancelDate
        lengthOfStay
        externalReferencesList
        externalReference
        blockID
        blockCode
        property
    }
  }
}

request.description: Detailed information on reservations booked in the past and future, including market code, rate code, reservation status, guest information and associated room and revenue details.

item.description:
The sample APIs for Bookings-Block, Bookings-Block Production Changed, Bookings-Block Status Changes, Bookings-Reservation. | API | Description | Inputs Required | | --- | --- | --- | | Bookings-Block | Block header and grid details, including actual and potential room and revenue statistics, catering events, and the associated profile and reservations data. | allotmentDetailsResort
allotmentDetailsBeginDate
allotmentDetailsEndDate | | Bookings-Block Production Changes | Detailed information on blocks and any changes to the number of rooms or revenue, by stay date, property and Block Owner. | allotmentchangesnetDetailsResort
allotmentchangesnetDetailsStayDate | | Bookings-Block Status Changes | Detailed information on the status changes throughout the production period of a block, including the new and old status codes, rooms and associated revenues, by property and Block Owner. | bookstatuschangeDetailsInsertDate
bookstatuschangeDetailsResort | | Bookings-Reservation | Detailed information on reservations booked in the past and future, including market code, rate code, reservation status, guest information and associated room and revenue details. | reservationDetailsResort
reservationDetailsTruncBeginDate
reservationDetailsTruncEndDate |

request.description: Provides detailed information on actions and the users who completed the action, including date, time, activity type, and description. Also providing the capability to combine with reservation, block and profile data.

item.description:
The sample API for Changes Log. | API | Description | Inputs Required | | --- | --- | --- | | Changes Log | Provides detailed information on actions and the users who completed the action, including date, time, activity type, and description. graphql.query:
query PropertyPropertyDetails($input: FinancialTransactionDetailsQueryArgumentsType!) {
  financialTransactionDetails(input: $input) {
    propertyPropertyDetails {
      property
    }
    financialTransactionDetails {
      businessDate
      revenueAmount
      covers
      taxInclusiveYN
      invoiceCloseDate
      netAmount
      grossAmount
      checkNumber
      trxNo
      trxNoAgainstPackage
      targetResort
      transactionDate
      folioView
      quantity
      pricePerUnit
      postedAmountInTransactionCurrency
      postedAmountInBaseCurrency
      originalFolioNumber
      invoiceNumber
      postingType
      originalBillNumber
      trxCode
      advGenerateTrxCode
      roomNumber
      reservationid
      roomClass
      rateCode
      sourceCode
      marketCode
      package
      cashier
      cashierID
      productid
    }
    reservationDetails {
      billNumber
      confirmationNo
    }
    profileAllInformationDetails {
      nationality
      nationalityCode
    }
    transactionCodeDetails {
      trxCode
      transactionCodeType
      transactionCodeGroup
      transactionCodeSubGroup
      trxCodeDisplay
      transactionCodeDescription
    }
  }
}

Commission information can be reported across all properties by Travel Agent and Source profiles, bank account, guest information and dates | commissionagentDetailsChainCode | | Financial-Deposit Ledger | Deposit ledger details including individual transactions, folio information, calendar and financial period and the reservation details. | depositledgerDetailsResort depositledgerDetailsTrxDate | | Financial-Guest Ledger | Guest ledger details including individual reservations, posted transaction details with debit and credit amounts. | finguestledgerDetailsResort finguestledgerDetailsTrxDate | | Financial-Transaction Codes | Transaction code header details including flags, group, and sub-group details. | transcodeDetailsResort | | Financial-Transaction Details | Detailed information on all posted transactions including net and gross amounts, currency, calendar and financial period, market and rate code. | financialtransDetailsResort

The Sales and Event has the API for Activities, Catering-Event Forecast, Catering-Event Postings, Catering-Event Resources, Catering-Event Status Changes, Sales Manager Goals. | **API** | **Description** | **Inputs Required** | | --- | --- | --- | | Activities | Provides information of Sales activities related to Accounts, Contacts, and Blocks for the selected Property. | workordersDetailsResort | | Catering-Event Forecast | Event revenue forecast details for defined periods broken down by Event Type, Revenue Group and Revenue Type. | eventtypeforecastDetailsEvType
eventtypeforecastDetailsResort | | Catering-Event Postings | Event posting details including revenues by property, Block, Event and Revenue groups. | eventpostingDetailsResort | | Catering-Event Resources | Event and Block details including group profile information, menu, packages, and revenues broken down by event type. | eventDetailsEvResort
eventDetailsStartDateTime
eventDetailsEndDateTime | | Catering-Event Status Changes | Detailed information on the status changes throughout the production period of an event, including the new and old status codes, change date, revenue and attendees. | eventstatuschangeDetailsResort | | Sales Manager Goals | The Sales Manager Goals enable the end users to retrieve information / create reports to compare the goals set for the Sales Managers against completed activities, and against statistical revenue data associated to profiles. | salesmanagerDetailsSrepCode |

graphql.query:
query StatisticsHistoryAndForecast($input: StatisticsHistoryAndForecastQueryArgumentsType!) {
  statisticsHistoryAndForecast(input: $input) {
    historyForecastDetails {
      historyForecast
      grossRateAmount
      departureRooms
      dayUseGrossRate
      totalCount
      resortPhysicalNumberRooms
      reservationType
      marketCode
      marketDescription
      deductGroupRooms
      deductIndividualRooms
      dayUseRooms
      eventType
      oooRooms
      roomNights
      roomRevenue
      roomType
      roomTypeDescription
      totalRevenue
    }
    reservationProfileAccountsCompanyDetails {
      accountName
      accountType
      country
      first
      last
    }
    propertyPropertyDetails {
      property
    }
  }
}

query StatisticsReservationsDailySummary($input: StatisticsReservationsDailySummaryQueryArgumentsType!) {
  statisticsReservationsDailySummary(input: $input limit:100) {
    reservationDailySummaryDetails {
      arrivalPersons
      arrivalRooms
      country
      cribs
      dayUsePersons
      departureRooms
      foodTax
      marketCode

      roomRevenue

      otherRevenue

      stayPersons
      totalRevenue
    }
    roomDetails {
      room
      roomClass
      roomClassDescription
      roomNumber
      roomFeatures
      roomStatus
    }
  }
}

request.description: Summarized booking data for both on the books and past stays including rooms, revenue and occupancy details broken out by Market Code, Rate code and periods of time.

item.description:
The Statistics has the API for Statistics-Forecast Summary, Statistics-History and Forecast, Statistics-Manager Reports,Statistics-Reservation Pace, Statistics-Reservation Dailiy, Statistics-Reservation Daily Summary, Statistics-Reservations Summary. | **API** | **Description** | **Inputs Needed** | | --- | --- | --- | | Statistics-Forecast Summary | Future on the books information including rooms, revenue and persons with breakdowns by room types, market code, source code and periods of time. | forecastsummaryDetailsResort
forecastsummaryDetailsConsideredDate | | Statistics-History and Forecast | Detailed information on past and future reservations including occupancy and revenue figures with all profile data, broken down by Market, Rate code, Room type and Periods of time. | historyforecastDetailsResort
historyforecastDetailsFilterDate | | Statistics-Manager Reports | Past statistics including rooms and revenue figures, arrivals, departures and occupancy broken out by multiple time periods. | managersreportDetailsResort
managersreportDetailsBusinessDate | | Statistics-Reservation Pace | The Reservation Pace contains daily rooms and revenue information on reservations on the books as of specific dates in the past(snapshot dates) summarized by Property, Market, Room Type, Channel and Rate Code. | resvpacefactDetailsResort
resvpacefactDetailsSnapshotDate
resvpacefactDetailsStayDate | | Statistics-Reservation Daily | Detailed information on past reservations including occupancy and revenue figures with all profile data, broken down by Market, Rate code, room type and periods of time. | resvdailystatsDetailsResort
resvdailystatsDetailsBusinessDate | | Statistics-Reservation Daily Summary | Summarized information on past reservations including number of persons, rooms and revenue figures, broken down by room type, market code, rate code and periods of time. | resvdailysummaryDetailsResort

resvdailysummaryDetailsBusinessDate | | Statistics-Reservations Summary | Summarized booking data for both on the books and past stays including rooms, revenue and occupancy details broken out by Market Code, Rate code and periods of time. | resvsummaryDetailsResort
resvsummaryDetailsConsideredDate |

graphql.query:
query SimpleReportsBookingsReservation($input: SimpleReportsBookingsReservationQueryArgumentsType!) {
  simpleReportsBookingsReservation(input: $input) {
    reservationGeneralDetails {
      actualCheckInDate
      actualCheckOutDate
      addressId
      blockId
      bookedRoomCategory
      bookedRoomCategoryLabel
      confirmationNo
      groupId
      groupName
      guestEmail
      guestNameId
      guestName
      numberOfRooms
      reservationNameId
      resvNumber
    }
  }
}

query SimpleReportsFinancialTransactions($input: SimpleReportsFinancialTransactionsQueryArgumentsType!) {
  simpleReportsFinancialTransactions(input: $input limit: 100) {
    srFinancialTransactionsDetails {
      property
      trxDate
      trxCode
      trxAmount
      transactionDescription
      trxNumber
      accountingCode
      folioNo
      folioType
      folioView
      invoiceNo
      invoiceType
      grossAmount
      netAmount
      rateCode
      marketCode
    }
  }
}

item.description:
The simple reports has API for Activities, Bookings Block, Bookings Reservation, Events, Financial Transactions, Profile Individuals. | **API** | **Inputs Required** | | --- | --- | | Activities | sractivitiesDetailsResort
sractivitiesDetailsStartDate
sractivitiesDetailsEndDate | | Bookings Block | scbusblockinfoDetailsResort
scbusblockinfoDetailsBeginDate
scbusblockinfoDetailsEndDate | | Bookings Reservation | reservationgeneralDetailsResort
reservationgeneralDetailsTruncArrival
reservationgeneralDetailsTruncDeparture | | Events | sceventinfoDetailsEvResort
sceventinfoDetailsEventStartDate
sceventinfoDetailsEventEndDate | | Financial Transactions | srfinancialtransactionsDetailsResort
srfinancialtransactionsDetailsTrxDate | | Profile Individuals | nameDetailsChainCode |
